/* Mem_Listen.xml - callListenHistory */
call rd_admin.sp_admin_member_all_listen_history(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

/* Mem_Listen.xml - callListenList */ select a.room_no ,a.mem_no ,ifnull(b.mem_nick,(select aa.mem_nick From rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak aa where aa.mem_no = a.mem_no)) as mem_nick ,c.mem_no as dj_mem_no ,ifnull(d.mem_nick,(select aa.mem_nick From rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak aa where aa.mem_no = c.mem_no)) as dj_nickname from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_member a left join rd_data.tb_member_basic b on a.mem_no = b.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_broadcast_room c on a.room_no = c.room_no left join rd_data.tb_member_basic d on c.mem_no = d.mem_no where a.mem_no= #{mem_no} and a.auth != 3 and a.join_date > DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 2 DAY) order by a.join_date desc limit 30
